title: Update regarding the conglomerate giant
story_body:
OMNI Corporation Announces Routine Updates

As of 09:00 EST, OMNI Corporation (OMNI) issued a series of routine updates regarding personnel, marketing initiatives, and environmental, social, and governance (ESG) developments.

Effective March 1, 2023, OMNI Corporation has appointed Karen J. Thompson as Vice President, Investor Relations, reporting to the Chief Financial Officer. Thompson brings 15 years of experience in investor relations and corporate communications.

In marketing news, OMNI Corporation has launched a refreshed website, available at omnicorp.com, as of 00:00 EST today. The updated site features enhanced navigation and streamlined access to company information.

Regarding ESG initiatives, OMNI Corporation has released its 2022 Sustainability Report, available for download on the company's website. The report highlights OMNI's progress toward reducing greenhouse gas emissions and increasing diversity, equity, and inclusion in the workplace.

No further information is available at this time.

Contact:
OMNI Corporation
Investor Relations
ir@omnicorp.com
